author: AP
title: College athletes choosing whether to stay in US or head home
description: For the more than 20,000 foreign college athletes in the United States, the coronavirus pandemic has created problems greater than the inability to compete
content:
STORRS, Conn. (AP) — All but one of Anna Makurat’s teammates headed home after the NCAA canceled this year’s postseason basketball tournament and the school suspended classes amid the COVID-19 pandemic. 
For the 19-year-old UConn freshman from Poland, the de… [+3821 chars]
